group_1.textLeft: Anything cooked by Manaka is delicious!

group_1.textRight: [chara:300901:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]Which! Is! WHY! I'm begging you here!!

group_1.textLeft: Which! Is! Why...! You have sauces, seasonings,@and spices, right?
You can use the ready-made takoyaki and@noodles.
If you adjust the sauce, it will taste like yours,@right?

group_1.textRight: ...That's...hmmm...

group_1.textLeft: Do you find it too hard to make it delicious with@ready-made stuff?
It's like they say on TV, something doesn't@choose something.

group_1.textRight: I have no idea what you're talking about...
You mean...a good worksman doesn't choose@their tools, right?
A true professional doesn't argue about tools@and materials...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that's it!
What do you think, Manaka? Can you not do it@with the stuff you have here?

group_1.textRight: Ngh...! I'm a professional too...
If that's what you say, I won't back down!
Wait a minute, I'll try to make some!

group_1.textCenter: Five kinds of takoyaki sauce and three kinds of@arranged yakisoba.

group_1.textLeft: Yaaay! Let's eat!
[chara:800202:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]It's so good! I love the tomato sauce!

group_1.textCenter: I think the one with the white cream is@my favorite...

group_1.textRight: I've never tried sour cream before, but@it's delicious.

group_1.textLeft: *Munch Munch*... it's a hit...*Munch Munch*

group_1.textRight: You can eat, but don't overeat.
Is this one of those secret family recipes?

group_1.textLeft: No? It's just an improvised one.

group_1.textRight: So, how hard is it to make?

group_1.textLeft: If you measure and mix the ingredients@properly, anyone can do it.

group_1.textRight: ...Then how about handing out the recipe, too?

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: We can give away one recipe per dish to our@customers.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that's a good idea... I'm sure we'll get@lots of people who want to try it at home.

group_1.textRight: If it's okay with Manaka, I'd like to hand them@out!

group_1.textLeft: I have no problem, as long as people enjoy it!

group_1.textRight: Yes...!

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry we keep relying on you for everything.

group_1.textRight: ...I thought you could do everything by yourself,@but now...
Yeah, I'm motivated now that I know there's@something I can do!

group_1.textLeft: So that's what you thought...

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry!

group_1.textLeft: Well, that's alright...I was a bit self-centered@too.
I'm going to give you the recipes.

group_1.textRight: Okay!

group_1.textCenter: The atmosphere is better than before...!@Everyone's so motivated!

group_1.textLeft: Manaka, you have some trash on you, I'll@take it off.

group_1.textRight: Oh, sorry, and thanks!
...Hmm? What are these...seeds?
(Hmm...I'm curious about these, so I'll@put them in my pocket.)

group_1.textLeft: Alright! Everything's settled!
Let's keep patrolling!
Come on, Manaka!

group_1.textRight: Why me... I'm not even on the committee?

group_1.textLeft: Because you're not busy, right?
Thanks to the people in your class taking care@of you.

group_1.textRight: They said, "we've been relying on you too much,@so take a break," but...
I can't possibly relax if I follow you!

group_1.textLeft: ...Is that a no?

group_1.textRight: ...You owe me a favor.

group_1.textLeft: Yaaay! Thank you, Manaka!
Let's make sure the school festival goes off@without a hitch!

group_1.textRight: Yeah!

group_1.textLeft: ...Hmm? There's a lot of requests for help in@the group!
All right! Let's GO!
